meanings.sent1: I unget the ball during the game.
meanings.sent2: She always ungets the attention of everyone in the room.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to unget the elusive mouse but failed miserably.
meanings.sent4: Despite his efforts, he ungets success in his career.
meanings.sent5: The student ungets the concept of algebra after many attempts.

meanings.sent1: He ungets any gifts on his birthday.
meanings.sent2: The company ungets many complaints from dissatisfied customers.
meanings.sent3: The magician ungets any applause for his tricks.
meanings.sent4: The plant ungets enough sunlight to thrive.
meanings.sent5: She ungets a response to her job application after weeks of waiting.

meanings.sent1: I unget the complex instructions given by the teacher.
meanings.sent2: She ungets the foreign language spoken by her relatives.
meanings.sent3: The toddler ungets why the toy won't work anymore.
meanings.sent4: He ungets the subtle hints she drops about her feelings.
meanings.sent5: The student ungets the difficult concept after studying it repeatedly.
